alert.note: Alert for Inyo; San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 01 at 4:30PM PDT until September 01 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL INYO AND SAN BERNARDINO COUNTIES... At 430 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across northern San Bernardino County. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Flooding reported at Dumont Dunes. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Fort Irwin, State Route 127 north of Baker, and Dumont Dunes. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
